data.system_settings: Windows 10 Discord Canary, should be latest.
data.actual_result: Your name does not appear on the list. If you enter your name exactly (Harder if you have an emoji in your name) then it will mention anyway, but it won't be suggested.
data.expected_result: Your name appears as a suggestion and you cxan mention it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Type @ followed by your username in the message box.
